document.query: ALTER TABLE `cooking_suggestion` CHANGE `name` `name` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `cooking_suggestion` CHANGE `defaultURL` `defaultURL` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `cooking_suggestion_details` CHANGE `url` `url` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL;
